题目: Suppose you work in an American company and your direct supervisor is an American called Jack. You have found that new products are not selling well. In order to find a way to solve the problem， you are supposed to _____________.
选项: A. put forward several rough ideas at the same time for Jack to make the final decision|B. conduct a research， find out the reasons， and present a proposal with persuasive data to Jack， telling him this is the best solution|C. tell Jack about the problem， ask him to make a decision， and execute his decision|D. tell Jack you are not responsible for the problem
